forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. Southwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
In the gentle embrace of the early morning hours, Downtown San Francisco awakens under a shroud of muted clouds, promising a day that dances between sun and shadow. Currently, the city finds itself partly cloudy with a crisp undertone, revealing hints of blue sky that beckon the promise of a milder day ahead. As the sun ascends, a slightly brisk southwestern breeze teases the air, inviting a pleasant chill that will soon yield to the warmth of the day. 

As temperatures inch toward the low 60s, the clarity of the sky hints at a fleeting radiance, though one may still catch wraiths of fog lingering in the nooks near the Golden Gate. The infamous marine layer seems to be holding its ground, offering a reminder of the Bay's unique climate. Dressing in layers would be most prudent; a lightweight jacket will provide warmth in the morning's coolness while allowing for comfort as the sun's embrace strengthens. 

One might take this unhurried day to stroll along the Embarcadero, coffee in hand, to witness the city unfold. A leisurely visit to a local café, perhaps, or a serene moment at a nearby park to savor the ambiance. While the world bustles around, today finds its quietude in the charming details—soft conversations, the aroma of fresh pastries, and the sight of petals unfurling in the lingering coolness.
